entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mentioned as the wife of Mr. Weasley and is associated with robes that contain gold.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Dumbledore's favorite boy who has been accused of being expelled.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Harry's favorite and is mentioned as having a favorite boy.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: The Minister who has business to discuss with Lucius.

entities.name: lucius
entities.description: Lucius is mentioned as being called by Fudge and is associated with Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: courtsroom
entities.description: The location where the outcome of Harry's expulsion would be determined.

relationships.description: Harry is mentioned as Dumbledore's favorite boy.
Fudge and Lucius are associated with each other as they have business to discuss.
The outcome of Harry's expulsion would be determined at the courtsroom.
Lucius is associated with Mr. Weasley, who is married to Mrs. Weasley.
Harry and Mr. Weasley are together in the lift when they see Fudge and Lucius walking away.
Fudge is associated with the courtsroom as he has business to discuss.
